welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Uddevalla, a charming city nestled on the coast of Sweden known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trollhattan Airport houses all arrival and departure gates as well as various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trollhattan Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, providing efficient services for businesses and logistics companies.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'THN Free WiFi' and following the prompts.
